add-an-image-to-pdf-with-alt-text-rollou.userFacingName: Add an Image to PDF (with Alt Text) - Rollout
add-an-image-to-pdf-with-alt-text-rollou.userFacingDescription: One of the important features users need when managing their PDF files is adding an image. Users want an easy way to add an image to their PDF documents that they can easily resize and move around the document. This experiment measures the impact of launching this feature for Firefox users and if that impacts their usage in any way. Specifically, we are trying to understand the impact on Firefox Daily Active Users (DAU) as a result of launching this feature.

csv-import-release-rollout.userFacingDescription: This rollout enables users to import logins from a CSV file from the about:logins page.

ech-roll-out.userFacingDescription: Encrypted Client Hello is a new TLS feature which provides greater privacy for HTTPS connections.

$l10n.text: Give Firefox a proper test drive
$l10n.comment: This title is displayed together with the picture of a fox driving a car, therefore a reference to 'test drive'. The goal is to invite users to spend time with Firefox and give it a proper test. If the localization of this message is challenging, consider using a simplified alternative as a reference for translation: 'Get the most out of Firefox'

$l10n.text: For peak performance, keep your new favorite indie browser one click away while you take it for a spin.
$l10n.comment: The message is displayed together with the picture of a fox driving a car, therefore a reference to a 'take it for spin' (typically used in reference to trying out a car). If you opted for translating the alternative title, or have problems translating this, you can use 'give it a try' as an alternative. 'indie' is short for the term 'independent'. In this instance, free from outside influence or control.

fox-doodle-set-to-default-early-day-user.userFacingName: Fox Doodle: Set to Default - Early Day User - Car Fox Rollout
fox-doodle-set-to-default-early-day-user.userFacingDescription: Set-to-default prompt highlighting benefits of choosing Firefox

de.fox-doodle-driving-title: Probieren Sie Firefox mal so richtig aus
de.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: Behalten Sie Ihren unabhängigen Lieblings-Browser nur einen Klickweite, während Sie ihn ausprobieren.
de.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Verabschieden Sie sich von nervigen Werbe-Trackern und nutzen Sie ein sichereres und schnelleres Interneterlebnis.

fr.fox-doodle-trackers-title: Gardez les traqueurs indésirables à distance
fr.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: Pour des performances de pointe, gardez votre nouveau navigateur indépendant préféré à portée de clic pendant que vous l’essayez.
fr.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Dites adieu aux traqueurs publicitaires pénibles et optez pour une expérience Internet plus rapide et plus sûre.

it.fox-doodle-driving-title: Fai un’accurata prova su strada di Firefox
it.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: Per prestazioni al top, tieni il tuo nuovo browser indipendente preferito a portata di clic mentre gli fai fare un giro di prova.
it.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Dì addio alle fastidiose pubblicità che ti seguono ovunque e vivi Internet in modo più sicuro e veloce.
it.fox-doodle-set-default-driving-primary-b: Apri i miei link con Firefox

en-CA.fox-doodle-driving-title: Give Firefox a proper test drive
en-CA.fox-doodle-trackers-title: Keep pesky trackers off your tail
en-CA.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: For peak performance, keep your new favorite indie browser one click away while you take it for a spin.
en-CA.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Say goodbye to annoying ad trackers and settle into a safer, speedy internet experience.

en-GB.fox-doodle-driving-title: Give Firefox a proper test drive
en-GB.fox-doodle-trackers-title: Keep pesky trackers off your tail
en-GB.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: For peak performance, keep your new favorite indie browser one click away while you take it for a spin.
en-GB.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Say goodbye to annoying ad trackers and settle into a safer, speedy internet experience.

en-US.fox-doodle-driving-title: Give Firefox a proper test drive
en-US.fox-doodle-trackers-title: Keep pesky trackers off your tail
en-US.fox-doodle-driving-subtitle: For peak performance, keep your new favorite indie browser one click away while you take it for a spin.
en-US.fox-doodle-trackers-subtitle: Say goodbye to annoying ad trackers and settle into a safer, speedy internet experience.

mozillaaccounts-toolbar-button-default-v.userFacingName: MozillaAccounts toolbar button default visibility rollout
mozillaaccounts-toolbar-button-default-v.userFacingDescription: This experiment measures the impact of showing the Firefox Accounts toolbar button by default for signed-out users.

product-insight-telemetry-via-server-kno.userFacingName: Product Insight Telemetry via Server Knobs - Rollout - Release
product-insight-telemetry-via-server-kno.userFacingDescription: Testing out the data and insights capture in the awesome bar.

release-experiment-for-additional-metric.userFacingName: Release - Experiment for Additional Metrics for Product Insights - Rollout
release-experiment-for-additional-metric.userFacingDescription: Testing out the data and insights capture in the awesome bar.

rollout-of-share-of-voice-for-sponsored-.userFacingName: Rollout of Share-of-Voice for Sponsored TopSites
rollout-of-share-of-voice-for-sponsored-.userFacingDescription: Rollout of the Share-of-Voice feature to dynamically manage ad inventory on the NewTab page.

upgrade-spotlight-rollout.userFacingDescription: Experimenting on onboarding content when you upgrade Firefox.

device-migration-q4-spotlights.userFacingDescription: Prompt to offer users support in backing up their Firefox data to seamlessly migrate to a new device.

de.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Stellen Sie sicher, dass wichtige Daten – wie Lesezeichen und Passwörter – auf all Ihren Geräten aktualisiert und geschützt werden.
Vergessen Sie nicht, Ihre Daten zu sichern
de.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: Mit einem Konto bleiben Ihre wichtigen Daten auf jedem verbundenen Gerät aktuell und geschützt.
de.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Befolgen Sie nur wenige einfache Schritte, um Ihre Lesezeichen, Chronik und Passwörter bei den ersten Schritten auf einem neuen Gerät mitzunehmen.
Planen Sie die Anschaffung eines neuen Geräts?

fr.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Assurez-vous que les informations importantes (telles que marque-pages et mots de passe) soient mises à jour et protégées sur tous vos appareils.
N’oubliez pas de sauvegarder vos données
fr.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: Un compte garde vos informations importantes à jour et les protège sur tous les appareils auxquels vous vous connectez.
La tranquillité d’esprit, grâce à Firefox
fr.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Suivez quelques étapes simples pour emporter avec vous vos marque-pages, votre historique et vos mots de passe lorsque vous aurez un nouvel appareil.

it.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Assicurati che le informazioni importanti, come segnalibri e password, siano aggiornate e protette su tutti i tuoi dispositivi.
Non dimenticarti di salvare i tuoi dati
it.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: Un account mantiene le tue informazioni importanti aggiornate e protette su qualsiasi dispositivo connesso.
it.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Segui alcuni semplici passaggi per portare con te segnalibri, cronologia e password quando inizi a utilizzare un nuovo dispositivo.
Come posso salvare i miei dati

en-CA.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-heavy-use: Make sure important info — like bookmarks and passwords — is updated and protected across all your devices.
Don’t forget to back up your data
en-CA.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-older-dev: An account keeps your important info updated and protected on any device you connect.
en-CA.device-migration-fxa-spotlight-getting-n: Follow a few simple steps to bring your bookmarks, history, and passwords with you when you get started on a new device.
Hoping for a new device this season?
How to back up my data

extensions-migration-in-import-wizard-11.userFacingDescription: This rollout makes extension migration available to users migrating from Chrome to Firefox.
